attributes.action: Change Woking shops working hours until midnight
attributes.background: It is a disgraceful matter that travellers aren't able to find any food and more importantly drinks at Woking station after 7pm

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Shop/store opening hours are the responsibility of individual businesses.

You could raise your issue directly with the stores at Woking Station.
